metadata.description:
Collects Daughters Of The Dragon: Marvel Digital Original #1-3.

Misty Knight and Colleen Wing have stolen the show in Marvel’s Luke Cage, Iron Fist and Defenders series on Netflix — and now they’re punching and kicking their way into their own book! This duo has been fighting crime as the Daughters of the Dragon for years, but does Misty’s new job with the FBI mean these two are splitzies? Not on your life! Be there as a crazy adventure that Colleen initiates puts comics’ two greatest butt-kickers on a collision course with a weird and scary side of the Marvel Universe that’ll have you on the edge of your seat!
metadata.name: Daughters of the Dragon - Marvel Digital Original
